channel.title: Really weird error need bad help (0 REPLYS...)
channel.description:
hi i have made a client with galkons base but had a error so i made it a JAR FILE i double click the jar and it says it cant find the main class client But i have client.class in the file same thing in run.bat it says Cant find the main class client
In my run.bat edit bit it says
[code][@ECHO OFF TITLE Galkons Base JAVA -Xmx500m client pause/code]
PLEASE HELP WAT DO I DO
[/code]

hi i have made a client with galkons base but had a error

i double click the jar and it says it cant find the main class client
